text: I can't recall a production where So many comics bolted in and out of holes s0 often _ The jokes were a reshuffle of the same old lot this time Brian Rix lost his skirt instead of his trousers. The action moved at tremendous speed, backed by some wonderful timing by the cast. I especially liked the tea-cup scene where six of the cast changed cups with the dexterity of Chinese jugglers.
